Info.Title: Dolphin Tale 2
Info.Writer: Charles Martin Smith, Karen Janszen (characters), Noam Dromi (characters)
Info.Actors: Morgan Freeman, Ashley Judd, Harry Connick Jr., Juliana Harkavy
Info.Plot: The team of people who saved Winter's life reassemble in the wake of her surrogate mother's passing in order to find her a companion so she can remain at the Clearwater Marine Hospital.
